de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store.vectorindex

Class VectorBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepycat.bind.tuple.TupleBase<E>
      • com.sleepycat.bind.tuple.TupleBinding<no.uib.cipr.matrix.Vector>
        • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store.vectorindex.VectorBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sleepycat.bind.EntryBinding<no.uib.cipr.matrix.Vector>

    public class VectorBinding
extends com.sleepycat.bind.tuple.TupleBinding<no.uib.cipr.matrix.Vector>
    This binding tries to optimize vector storage. Very sparse vectors are simply stored as sparse vectors. Other vectors are compressed using GZip. Depending on its sparseness, a vector is stored either using a sparse representation or a dense representation.
    Author:
    Richard Eckart de Castilho

      Set the threshold of the vector usage below which a vector is always stored as a sparse vector without compression.
